main event: Two round bright objects were observed in the sky over Helena, Montana on July 31, 1961.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 5 minutes.,The objects were reported to be at an altitude of 25,000 to 30,000 feet.,The objects appeared three to four miles apart in a trail.,They were noted to be bright and approximately three to four times as bright as a star.,The exact nature or identity of the observed objects remains unknown.
